description: Unified bidirectional transformation workflows for SWIFT MT ↔ ISO 20022 MX (CBPR+)

workflows.description: Detects message format (MT or MX) and sets transformation direction
Common MT message parser for all message types (Outgoing: MT→MX)
ISO 20022 MX message parser for reverse transformation (Incoming: MX→MT)

MT101 precondition checks for payment initiation messages
MT101 to pain.001 document mapping for payment initiation messages
